name: Real Racing camaro
description:
The objective of the game is to complete the level. Depending on the time spent on the passage of the map, you are awarded points. Also, due to site limits, we had to remove some yuan elements

w - straight

s - back

d - to the right

a - to the left

The game is under development, new modes will be available soon (driving around the city, creation mode,) The appearance of the gameplay will also be improved (a speedometer and a time counter have been added, a garage will also be added where you can choose and improve cars).
